name: Cityscape Sprint
description:
Cityscape Sprint is a game made for the 19th ScoreSpace Jam, the theme was parkour.

You must master the movement system in this arcade-platformer to traverse the stage as quickly as possible and collect as many points as you can in the time limit.

Just one button is required to play (Space or Left Click), press this to jump, leap, and slide your way up the leaderboard.

Known Issue: The leaderboard usually lags behind by one playthrough.

Tips and tricks:

1. The height of your jump varies by how long you hold the button.

2. Pressing space just before you hit the ground will allow you to slide, giving you a burst of speed.

3. Sliding off of an edge causes you to jump off of it.

All assets and code created by me.
